track.name: Functional Programming
track.descriptions: The art of programming with expressions and functions. Experience the challenge of programming without state. A good paradigm for those interested in Map-Reduce and parallel computing.

primary_contest.description: The contest hosts seven challenges ranging from some basic functional programming concepts to some harder algorithmic problems. Languages allowed: Scala, Haskell, Racket, Clojure, OCaml, F#, Common Lisp and Erlang.
primary_contest.name: Lambda Calculi - March 2016

model.preview: Simplify algebraic expressions in one variable.
model.name: Simplify the Algebraic Expressions
